level.text: The Department's delivery of forensic science services to agencies, including the timeliness of service; and
The general effectiveness of the Department in the furtherance of its agency mission; and
Advise the Mayor and the Council, as it considers necessary, on matters relating to the Department or forensic science.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-18
level.text: For history of Law 19-18, see notes under ยง 5-1501.01.
